Package ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.model

Class SplendorGame

java.lang.Object
ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.model.SplendorGame
public class SplendorGame extends Object
Class that represents the current state of a game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    SplendorGame(SplendorBoard boardState, int prestigePointsToWin, List<Player> players, int turnCounter)
    Creates a Splendor Game with the board state, number of prestige points to win and ordered player list.

  • Constructor Details

    • SplendorGame

      public SplendorGame(SplendorBoard boardState, int prestigePointsToWin, List<Player> players, int turnCounter)
      Creates a Splendor Game with the board state, number of prestige points to win and ordered player list.
      Parameters:
      boardState - The state of the gameboard.
      prestigePointsToWin - The amount of prestige points needed to win the game.
      players - The player order in the game.
      turnCounter - The turn id associated with the player
